features: 7-in-1 Expansion - LENTION CB-CE18 features a 100W Type C charging port, a 4K@30Hz HDMI output port, a USB3.0, and 2 USB 2.0 ports. The USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 ports for connecting multiple devices such as flash drive, keyboard, mouse, printer, etc. SD and Micro SD 2.0 Card Reader can read up to 256G memory cards.【Noted:Not support Superdrive】

Max 100W Power Delivery - Providing up to 100W Super Fast Power Delivery pass-through to power your host devices (such as laptops, tablets, phones), and provide extra power to the peripheral that is connected to the USB ports simultaneously
4K HDMI Port for UHD Visual Feast - Mirror or extend your screen with USB C to HDMI adapter to HDTV, monitor, or projector. Support 3840x2160 4K@30Hz, 2560x1600 and lower resolutions at 60Hz.

Universal Compatibility - Work with MacBook Pro 2016-2023 (13/14/15/16/M1/M2) & MacBook Air 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023, New iMac/Pro, MacBook 12, New Surface Pro/Book/Go with USB-C, Chromebook, and more full-functional type-c devices.

Stable Driver 3.0 Certified - LENTION published the advanced Stable Driver 3.0 standard to help customers buy with confidence. The standard included 3 main features: Non-Interference between connected peripherals, Sufficient power supply, and the Devices working under normal temperature without overheating

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug and Play Easy work with smartphones, driver free, plug and play Makes Your Work More Efficient Mirror or extend your screen with LENTION USB C to 4k@30Hz HDMI adapter to HDTV, monitor, or projector. You could making a vivid presentation in a meeting 100W Power Delivery Supported The USB C Hub supports a 100W USB C pass-through charging, ideal for MacBook Pro/Air or and other USB C devices

Light and portable Only 45g(0.01lb) in weight, light and portable size, always be ready Elegant Mac-style LENTION CB-CE18 with a elegant Mac-style design. Sleek aluminum finish perfectly complements Apple accessories. The aluminum case is better for heat dissipation, safer to use Compact Size Lightweight and compact, easy to set into your laptop sleeve, bag or pocket. Portable size, plug and play, drive free

About Stable Driver The innovation of USB-C technology brings a revolutionary change to the whole electronic industry, which redefines how thin a device can be. More importantly, it makes the dream of One-Connect-All come true. A stable and reliable way to expand the USB port is becoming more and more important. While the truth is, as the unregulated market growing, the All-In-One may become the One-Fails-All. To solve these fatal problems, LENTION published the advanced industrial standard Stable Driver to help customers buy products with confidence. Stable Driver solved 3 main concerns from customers: Non-interference between different ports (from signal interference to Plug & Unplug interference), Sufficient power supply to support the peripherals working normally, and Working under reasonable temperature to maximize the lifespan of the device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, Better Support
reviews.reviewText: When I first received the product, I couldn't get it to work. Not being the most technologically adept person, I figured it was me. After others couldn't get it to work either, I reached out to the company.They were very responsive and had me try a couple things which didn't get the unit to function. After we realized it was a faulty unit, they immediately sent a replacement.The new unit worked great and is a nice addition. The multiple USB-A ports make it nice for connecting an external keyboard, mouse and external hardrive. The HDMI end allows for my external monitor so I can use the laptop with a complete workstation at either work or home. Plus, the price is at the right point.The unit is what it is, however it's the service I received from the company that gets me to highly recommend buying this product. We don't get much good service from companies anymore, and my hard earned dollars will go to the ones that provide that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product that delivers
reviews.reviewText: I bought this USB C Hub to read memory cards and copy files to my Macbook Pro.I must say that the first one that I received did not work properly, it was losing the connection to the Mac as if it was getting ejected. I tried it on a Windows PC, and it worked with no issues.I got great help from Lention's customer service, very responsive and helpful, they asked me to try a few things, and they ended up sending me a replacement.The replacement works perfectly with both the Macbook and a Windows PC.Good stuff, feels quality, read speed is fast, and I can now transfer my files to my Mac. I would recommend to anybody using a Mac and needing a USB-C hub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JUST KNOW IT REQUIRES A POWER SOURCE TYPCE C TO USB TO WALL
reviews.reviewText: CORRECTION TO PRIOR NEGATIVE REVIEW:I was wrong about this item not working and instead I just did not know how to use it. The seller was very helpful and I did not realize that this hub has to be plugged into the wall as a power source to be used. Once I plugged it into the power source with a type C to usb, it worked fine for all outlets. I now changed my review.PRIOR REVIEW:This does not work. The only thing it does is charge my phone when plugged in but it doesn’t even sync the phone to the iMac. I tried to get it to work with apple for 2 hours. It’s definitely the hub. USBs don’t work and neither does the type c or hdmi. Very disappointing. I waited a while for it to arrive for it to not work so now I have to wait for a refund before I can even start the process of purchasing another. Very inconvenient…especially when it advertised it was compatible with my iMac m1.

reviews.reviewText: Efficient, works just as described. I use it for my old camera memories, they fit just right.

reviews.reviewText: This makes my space a lot better. I have different type of computer accessories with different USBs and this definitely keeps me connected with ease.
Bom custo benefício para quem tem Macbook

This is my 2nd edit to this review. Original problem has been fixed and everything works great on this device. I have to say the team at Lention has superb customer service. They helped resolve the issue I had with their device and went above and beyond in ensuring I was satisfied with the product. Im changing my rating to a 5 star, they did everything they could to help and Im blown away by the care for their customers. I highly recommend doing business with this company. Ill leave my initial review below incase others experience the same issue. If I may provide a tip to anyone with the same issue. Try plugging in a power supply and hdmi to the adaptor before plugging into ipad.Original review: I Initially gave this 2 stars because the hdmi connection wasnt working with my ipad pro. It still isnt working, however, i believe its more an apple/ ipad issue and not the adaptor. I have since tried it with my samsung phone and the hdmi port works just fine. I Bought this specifically so I could use the HDMI to TV ipad connection with a USBC charge pass through. My other intended use was to plug in keyboards, midi controllers USB accessories and SD cards. I can confirm they all work. Except when it came time to extend my Ipad display through the HDMI port. Would not work no matter what I did. Checked every setting possible on ipad and TV. Watched youtube videos and couldn't find a solution. One user said his multi port of different brand didn't work with his ipad either. He proceeded to use a generic hdmi only adapter with no other ports and it worked. I also had access to a simple hdmi only adaptor lacking the charge pass through and other plugins and lo and behold it worked first try. So for whatever reason, the ipad struggles to identify the hdmi port on this multi port adaptor but works no problem with simple adapters. Frustrating because I want an all in one port without needing to carry multiple adaptors. I thought this was the one, I like the sleek design and cable so it doesn't interfere with my case but sadly it does not do what I need it to do when it comes to HDMI.
Hola!El producto me pareció bueno, pero no fue compatible con mis equipos.Vi que mi paquete llegó con ustedes, estoy a espera del reembolso.Gracias!!!!
